byline.contributor: Vinod Sreeharsha contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro, and Sofia Perpetua from Salvador.

abstract: Brazil launches nationwide public awareness campaign to combat mosquitoes spreading Zika virus, instructing public on ways to reduce breeding grounds for insect; initiative highlights growing urgency by Brazilian officials to mitigate outbreak of virus and rising international concern over it.
lead_paragraph: Soldiers distributed fliers that told residents how to reduce the breeding grounds for Aedes aegypti, the mosquito that transmits Zika and other ills.

headline.main: Brazil Pushes Public to Do Its Part in Fighting Zika Spread
headline.print_headline: Brazil Public Told It Must Undertake Zika Battle

snippet: Soldiers distributed fliers that told residents how to reduce the breeding grounds for Aedes aegypti, the mosquito that transmits Zika and other ills.
